title: Pilot: Has The UK Economy Recovered?
itunes:author: New Economics Foundation
itunes:summary:
Kirsty Styles chats to James Meadway, Senior Economist at the New Economics Foundation (NEF), about the reality behind the falls in inflation and unemployment and rises in real wages and growth.

Music:

Featuring Going Forward Looking Back by Podington Bear (00:17 — 01:07) under CC BY-NC licence.
Podington Bear: http://soundofpicture.com/
CC BY-NC: https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc/3.0/

Produced by James Shield & Huw Jordan
